title: PBE site is still down
body: Honestly i've been trying to get a PBE account for 2 years so i can test stuff out and i still haven't been able to and when ever i go to the "PBE Become a tester" thing it's always been down. I just want to be able to get my account and go on but time and time again the same stuff happens. "ERROR 500"

replies.body:
The 500 error on the PBE page is usually caused by a conflict between your PC and the web page. You should be able to resolve this by [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and using a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) to access the page.

Let me know if this worked for you.
